Microsoft 在 Windows Server 中弃用 PPTP 和 L2TP VPN 协议https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/microsoft-deprecates-pptp-and-l2tp-vpn-protocols-in-windows-server/ Sat, 12 Oct 2024 11:25:36 -0400劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯MicrosoftSecurity https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/microsoft-deprecates-pptp-and-l2tp-vpn-protocols-in-windows-server/ Microsoft has officially deprecated the Point-to-Point Tunneling Protocol (PPTP) and Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol (L2TP) in future versions of Windows Server, recommending admins switch to different protocols that offer increased security.
